sentences.sentence: I was going to ask you the same thing Watch out for that pedes? Trian!
sentences.translation: 我正想问你同样的事。小心撞到那个行人。

sentences.sentence: In frequency synthesis by phase lock, the loop gain will vary by the same amount due to this effect, which generally im - pedes optimization of loop performance.
sentences.translation: 在锁相频率合成器中，由于压控灵敏度的变化，环路增益也将产生同样大小的变化，这就妨碍了环路特性的最佳化。
